name: WebServiceMock

methods.name: doInvoke
methods.signature: public Void doInvoke(Object stub, Object soapRequest, Map<String,Object> responseMap, String endpoint, String soapAction, String requestName, String responseNamespace, String responseName, String responseType)
methods.description: The implementation of this method is called by the Apex runtime to send a fake response when a Web service callout is made after Test.setMock has been called.

params.name: responseType
params.description: An instance of the auto-generated class. The SOAP Web service request being invoked. A collection of key/value pairs representing the response to send for the request. When implementing this interface, set the responseMap argument to a key/value pair representing the response desired. The endpoint URL for the request. The requested SOAP operation. The requested SOAP operation name. The response namespace. The name of the response element as defined in the WSDL. The class for the response as defined in the auto-generated class.

description: Enables sending fake responses when testing Web service callouts of a class auto-generated from a WSDL.
